pullRequest.title: feat(Component/ReleaseUI): Added button to remove selected vendor for component and release
pullRequest.bodyText:
Once selected and saved a vendor user had no choice to remove it, user can only select another vendor.
Added button to remove selected vendor for component and release
Signed-off-by: Jaideep Palit jaideep.palit@siemens.com
